title: 2014 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 23)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2014 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Just some light house cleaning today...

(1) I've not given up on the idea of moving these "The Year In Christian Music" torrents to another website.  But with the traveling I've been doing these past few weeks, and with the traveling I still hope to do this summer and in the very near future, I've just been pressed for time to further the idea along.  But a big thank you once again to Nathan.S, and everyone else for their help on the project.

(2) Please keep the 2014 requests flowing.  Because I'm not by my computer as much, I am sure I am missing lots of new releases.  And although you can be sure I will eventually share anything I have from 2014, sometimes when an album request is made, it is the first time I am learning of that album.  So I am able to spend some time specifically hunting it down.  Otherwise it might become overlooked entirely.

(3) The best way to communicate with me is always in my most current thread.  Occasionally I will revisit older threads, and notice some of you asking me questions.  I want to help you out, and answer those questions if I am able to, but with the volume of torrents I have here on The Pirate Bay, it's just a whole lot easier, and less time consuming for me to monitor my most current thread for that correspondence.

(4) And last but not least, do with these albums what you feel in your heart is right.  But I still encourage you to seed what you've downloaded, share with your friends and family, support the bands you intend of keeping, praise God almighty for the inspiration, talents, and opportunities He has given these musicians to make this music available to us today, and never substitute time spent in your Bible for the entertainment value found within these songs.

ROCK: 390 East, Andrew Ehrenzeller, The Museum, The Remission Flow, Stellar Kart.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Armond, J Murph, Kaleb Moghes, L9, Mike Sarge, Pigeon John, Serge, Yohan.  COUNTRY: Brantley Gilbert.  HARDCORE/METAL: Consecrate, Reformers.  CONTEMPORARY: Dante Schmitz, David Dunn, Jeremy Casella.  ALTERNATIVE: Fight The Fade, First Fracture, Jonah33.  R&B: Isaiah Templeton.  GOSPEL: J Moss.  POP: Jessica Frech, Josiah James, Keren Silver, Kyle Kupeck.  GOSPEL: Latice Crawford.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Summit Worship.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Us And Our Daughters.  REGGAE: Various.

Including today's bundle, we've now been able to share 804 titles amongst ourselves this year.

The 32 we are sharing in today's 23rd bundle include...

 * 390 East - 2014 - Wake Me Up - Single
 * Andrew Ehrenzeller - 2014 - Children Of Promise
 * Armond - 2014 - Praise Break
 * Brantley Gilbert - 2014 - Just As I Am - Deluxe Edition
 * Consecrate - 2014 - Holy Holy EP
 * Dante Schmitz - 2014 - Brighter Than The Sun
 * David Dunn - 2014 - Today Is Beautiful - Single
 * Ethan Kent - 2014 - Work In Progress
 * Fight The Fade - 2014 - Rise - Single
 * First Fracture - 2014 - Afraid Of What's To Come
 * Isaiah Templeton - 2014 - I Can Do Anything - Single
 * J Moss - 2014 - The Very Best Of J Moss
 * J Murph - 2014 - Inspired By The Inspired
 * Jeremy Casella - 2014 - Death In Reverse
 * Jessica Frech - 2014 - Speak Softer Love Louder - Single
 * Jonah33 - 2014 - Dead Man Walking EP
 * Josiah James - 2014 - Identity EP
 * Kaleb Moghes - 2014 - Crownless King
 * Keren Silver - 2014 - Show Me Your Glory
 * Kyle Kupecky - 2014 - Kyle Kupecky EP
 * L9 - 2014 - A Rcklss Night
 * Latice Crawford - 2014 - Latice Crawford
 * Michael Lofton - 2014 - Letting Go
 * Mike Sarge - 2014 - Broken Heartz Club
 * Museum, The - 2014 - What We Stand For
 * Pigeon John - 2014 - Encino Man
 * Reformers - 2014 - Abolish
 * Remission Flow, The - 2014 - Rhythms Of Grace
 * Serge - 2014 - Off Season
 * Stellar Kart - 2014 - Day Of War - Single
 * Summit Worship - 2014 - Our God Is Unstoppable
 * Us And Our Daughters - 2014 - All That We Once Were EP
 * Various - 2014 - Reggae Worship Play Hillsong Reggae
 * Yohan - 2014 - Yohan

God Bless,
TorrentTracts, May 2014
